summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2464 for the improvement of New Tenth Avenue from East Union Street to East Madison Street, all in the City of Seattle, by the necessary grading, construction of wooden curbs and gutters; wood walks and planking sixteen (16) feet in width and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 26599, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
